name: Windshield wipers
description: Driving in the rain can be stressful, especially at night. The windshield wiper provides optimal night clarity and enhances safer driving.

name: Taillights/Turn signal
description: They are red in color and have accompanying white lights beside them to indicate when the vehicle is in reverse. When you're on the road, tail lights make other car's aware of your presence so that you can travel safely in the dark

name: Rear Suspension
description: The rear suspension of a luxury coupe is designed to maximize comfort and will have a softer suspension that absorbs more movement

name: Catalytic Converter
description: A catalytic converter is an exhaust emission control device that converts toxic gases and pollutants in exhaust gas from an internal combustion engine into less-toxic pollutants by catalyzing a redox reaction

name: Battery
description: An automotive battery or car battery is a rechargeable battery that is used to start a motor vehicle. Its main purpose is to provide an electric current to diferent unit of a car

name: Windscreen
description: A windscreen, also known as a windshield, is the glass at the front of a vehicle through which the road can be seen.

name: Gear Lever
description: A gear lever or a gear stick is the lever that you use to change gear in a car or other vehicle

name: Steering wheel
description: A steering wheel is the part of a vehicle that a person uses to determine the direction that the vehicle will go
